title: Sale, acquisition, or use of goods by a public
context: ยง103D-803 Sale, acquisition, or use of goods by a public procurement unit. Any public procurement unit may sell to, acquire from, or use any goods belonging to another public procurement unit or external procurement unit independent of the requirements of parts III and XII. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of ยง2; am L 1994, c 186, ยง14; am L 1998, c 11, ยง8]
